SEARCH

Package geometries

package geometries
  • Class
    Description
    Cylinder
    Represents a cylinder in 3D space, defined by a central axis and a height.
    Geometries
    Represents a collection of geometries that can be treated as a single entity.
    Geometry
    Represents a general geometric object in 3D space.
    Intersectable
    Interface representing an object that can be intersected by a ray.
    Plane
    Represents a plane in 3D space, defined by either three points or a point and a normal vector.
    Polygon
    Polygon class represents a two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
    RadialGeometry
    Represents a geometric object with a radial shape, such as a sphere or a cylinder.
    Sphere
    Represents a sphere in 3D space, defined by a center point and a radius.
    Triangle
    Represents a triangle in 3D space, defined as a specific case of a polygon with three vertices.
    Tube
    Represents an infinite tube in 3D space, defined by a central axis (a ray) and a radius.
